Question & Options:

Options:
A. Hans Zimmer
B. Brian Tyler
C. John Williams
D. Danny Elfman

Options:
A. Sony Music
B. Varèse Sarabande
C. Warner Music
D. Universal Music

Options:
A. Brian Anthony
B. Justin Timberlake
C. Bruno Mars
D. Usher

What is the theme song for the movie 'Dragonball Evolution' released in 2009?
Options:
A. Rule by Ayumi Hamasaki
B. Dragon Soul by Takayoshi Tanimoto
C. Fight Song by Rachel Platten
D. Unstoppable by Sia

What is the title of the soundtrack for the movie 'Dragonball Evolution' released in 2009?
Options:
A. Dragonball Evolution: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack
B. Dragonball Z: Battle of Gods Soundtrack
C. Dragonball GT: A Hero's Legacy Soundtrack
D. Dragonball Super: Broly Soundtrack
Correct Answer: Dragonball Evolution: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack
